sentences.en: Advertisements are designed to entice people into spending money / to spend money.
sentences.cn: 广告宣传的目的是诱使人花钱.

sentences.en: Advertisements are designed to entice people to spend money.
sentences.cn: 广告就是设计出来诱人花钱的.

sentences.en: An attempt is being made to entice otters back to the river.
sentences.cn: 人们正试图把水獭引诱回河里去.

sentences.en: Child murderers in the past have very often carried photographs of young children to entice their victims away.
sentences.cn: 过去儿童谋杀犯常常携带一些小孩子的照片来诱拐他们的受害者。

sentences.en: He tried to entice the child away from its home.
sentences.cn: 他企图怂恿那个孩子离家出走.

sentences.en: He tries to counterfeit all the good things God offers you, aiming at our weakness in order to exploit our vulnerabilities and entice us into the darkness.
sentences.cn: 他试图假冒所有上帝提供给我们的好事情，针对我们的弱点，以便开发我们的缺点，诱使我们进入黑暗。

sentences.en: I don't see why the English should want to entice us away from our native land.
sentences.cn: 我不明白,为什英国人要引诱我们离开自己的国土.

sentences.en: Incentive program will be organized to entice staff to sell.
sentences.cn: 实行员工销售奖励措施.

sentences.en: Nothing will entice Mr White into breaking the law.
sentences.cn: 什么都不可能促使怀特先生干违法的事.

sentences.en: Retailers have tried almost everything to entice shoppers through their doors.
sentences.cn: 零售商们几乎尝试了所有办法以吸引购物者进入商店。

sentences.en: Retailers have tried almost everything, from cheap credit to free flights, to entice shoppers through their doors.
sentences.cn: 从低价信贷到免费航班，零售商们几乎用尽一切办法说服购物者惠顾。

sentences.en: The bargain prices are expected to entice customers away from other stores.
sentences.cn: 低廉的价格意在把顾客从其他商店吸引过来。

sentences.en: The higher rate would entice banks to tie up money they otherwise might lend to customers or other banks.
sentences.cn: 更高的利率将诱使银行收回流动性，减少向客户或其它银行发放贷款的数量。

sentences.en: Then don't try to entice me to overlook my furlough.
sentences.cn: 那就别劝我放弃自己的休假了.

sentences.en: They'll entice doctors to move from the cities by paying them better salaries.
sentences.cn: 他们将出更高的薪水吸引医生们走出城市。

sentences.en: They'll entice thousands of doctors to move from the cities to the rural areas by paying them better salaries.
sentences.cn: 他们将通过支付更高的薪水怂恿成千上万的医生从城市迁往农村。

sentences.en: To entice all the people looking for a loo-break to stay a bit longer, locals bought the antebellum houses and turned them into restaurants and inns.
sentences.cn: 为了诱使那些原本只想小憩一会的过客待的更久一些，当地人买下内战前的房子，改装成餐馆和旅店。

sentences.en: To influence or lead by means of wiles; entice.
sentences.cn: 引诱，诱骗通过使用诡计来影响或怂恿；诱使。

sentences.en: Trams have been supplied to entice them out of their cars.
sentences.cn: 有轨电车已投入使用,意在引导人们减少使用私家车.

sentences.en: West Lake's beauty is ever changing but never fails to entice and entrance.
sentences.cn: 西湖以变幻多姿的风韵,令人心旷神怡.

sentences.en: Yet electricity can entice smoke sent out by an extinguished light.
sentences.cn: 然而电却能吸引由熄灭的火花产生的烟.

words.tran_cn: 诱惑；怂恿；引诱物；吸引力

trans.tran_en: to persuade someone to do something or go somewhere, usually by offering them something that they want
